Data Fields
mlcd_attr_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Mono LCD

Monochrome LCD attributes. More...

#include <mlcd.h>

Collaboration diagram for mlcd_attr_t:

Detailed Description

This contains the attributes of a monochrome LCD.

Data Fields

u16 w
 LCD width in pixels.
 
u16 h
 LCD height in pixels.
 
u32 size
 The size of mem in bytes (typically w*h/8)
 
u16 cols
 Number of memory 32-bit word columns.
 
u16 rows
 Number of memory rows.
 
u32 freq
 This value is R/W and specifies how often the screen is refreshed.
 
u8 hold
 This values specifies the hold count. A non-zero hold count prevents the screen from refreshing.
 
u8 orientation
 Orientation bitmask.
 
u16 margin_left
 Left margin.
 
u16 margin_right
 Left margin.
 
u16 margin_top
 Left margin.
 
u16 margin_bottom
 Left margin.
